Malasadas in west maui / Lahaina

[[posterous-content:NYqtNWLqYplW5QfpjaTP]]

For many years, we have been searching for Portuguese Hot Malasadas on West Maui.

Today we had breakfast at Lulu's in Lahaina Cannery Mall, and they had them (they were complimentary with our breakfast)

Now if only I could find orgeat syrup for our Mai Tai's ...
